related_questions.question:
Where is the living room?    a. on the first floor
b. on the basement
c. on the ground floor
d. on the second floor​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

" where is the living room? " ( dimana ruang tamu? )

C. on the ground floor ( dilantai dasar )

Penjelasan:

A. on the first floor ( salah ).

( dilantai pertama ) = bisa dinyatakan lantai pertama setelah lantai dasar

B. on the basement ( salah )

( di ruang bawah tanah ) = yg ditanyakan " dimana ruang tamu? " ruang tamu umumnya terdapat pada lantai dasar.

C. on the ground floor ( benar )

( dilantai dasar ) = ruang tamu terdapat pada lantai dasar.

D. on the second floor ( salah ).

( dilantai kedua ) = dilantai kedua biasanya terdapat kamar

= jadi jawabannya c. on the ground floor

related_questions.question:
Ani:....use your car,boby?    Boby:yes of course
 A.my i
 B.could you 
 C.can i have
 D.may you

Anton,_____, passed away yesterday morning    a. to whom I talked last week
b. to which I talked last week
c. to who I talked last week
d. to whose I talked last week
e. to where I talked last week
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a) to whom I talked last week

Penjelasan:

kita pakai relative clause whom saat membicarakan object di sebuah kalimat:

- kata 'I' merupakan subject karena 'I' berada di belakang verb 'talked', artinya yang berbicara itu saya

- sedangkan kata 'Anton' disini adalah object menunjukkan kepada siapa saya berbicara

I never pray every night
Am i pray every night?

(-) i never pray every night
(?) do i pray every night

3. ANDI : Angie, may I borrow your pen? I left mine in my room.    ANGIE I didn't bring mine, either.
A Sure.
C. It doesn't matter.
B. I'm sorry
D. Anytime.​

answers.answer:
ANGIE Saya juga tidak membawa milik saya.

Tertentu.

C.Tidak ada masalah.

B.Maafkan aku

D. Kapan saja.​

JAWABAN NYA C

MAAF KALO SALAH SEMOGA MEMBANTU

Jawaban:

B. I'm sorry

Penjelasan:

Andi : Angie, may i borrow your pen? I left mine in my room.

Angie : I didn't bring mine, either. I'M SORRY.
